data.text: Sofara Naamaka naxa a fala,
«I xa masenyi bara n tɔɔrɔ,
N bara marakɔrɔsi nde mɛ
I mu a kolon kabi adama naxa daa, a lu duniɲa ma,
mixi ɲaaxie xa xunnakeli mu buma?
Hali a xa fe gbo yɛ,
a fama sɔntɔde a lu alɔ se naxan tide mu na,
A dangima nɛ alɔ xiye.
A kolonmae mu a toma sɔnɔn,
A xa die setaree kima see ra,
Sɛnbɛ naxan nu na a yi ra a fonike ra,
Fe ɲaaxi na rafan mixi ma,
a mu a bɛɲin,
a xa donse findima pɔsɔnɛ nan na a furi kui.
A naafuli naxan donxi, a fama na bɔxunde.
A bɔximase xa xɔnɛ nan bɛsuma,
A harige naxan sɔtɔxi,
a na birin nagbilenma nɛ,
barima a bara se ba tɔɔrɔmixie yi ra.
Wasabali nan to nu a ra a xa milɛ kui,
A to nu se birin maɲɔxunxi a yɛtɛ nan bɛ,
A nɛ na a xa fanyi tagi,
A dɛge tɛmui, Ala fama a tɔɔrɔde a xa xɔnɛ ra,
Xa geresose lanmadi mu a tɔɔrɔ,
Hali a tanbɛ tala e a sɔxɔxi naxan na,
A xa naafuli birin luma dimi nan kui,
Ala a xa yunubi makɛnɛn ma,
A xa naafuli birin sigama nɛ
Ala na nan fima mixi ɲaaxi ma kɛ ra.
